santa[source]

santa(feature)

Prints a list of elements as strings, and connects them with commas

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
santa(["a", "b", "c"])

a, b, c

class WordType[source]

WordType(word, name, wikitext)

Stores a word type (noun, verb, adjective, etc.) of a specific german word (Hund, Katze, etc.) Attributes: word: a german word name: name of the word type wikitext: wikitext for the current word type extracted from wiktionary

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

WordType.__str__[source]

WordType.__str__()

Return str(self).

{% endraw %}
